message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.Distributed Systems, cs.OS, cs.PF. 

The paper discusses the development of MPICH-G2, a library for running MPI programs across multiple computers in a distributed computing environment. This topic is closely related to distributed computing (cs.DC) and networked systems (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the use of the Globus Toolkit for resource allocation and process control, which falls under the category of distributed systems (cs.Distributed Systems). The implementation of performance-critical operations and network topology information also relates to operating systems (cs.OS) and performance evaluation (cs.PF).
